hints.content:
A rectangle with $\blueE7$ same-size rows looks like this:

![A rectangle divided into 7 equal squares in a column. The squares are numbered 1 through 7 from top to bottom.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8018d630f69e5997736ac6771e6e95c83649b081)

A rectangle with $\maroonD1$ same-size column looks like this:

![A rectangle column with number 1 at the top.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/13017a5a9365e841cd09e0e0044c809ef27386e1)
Which rectangle shows $\blueE7$ rows and $\maroonD1$ column of same-size squares?

This rectangle shows $\blueE7$ rows and $\maroonD1$  column of same-size squares:

![A rectangle divided into 7 equal squares in a column.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7dbd232c84de35f0314f9a95a56b26c917c28230)

question.content:
**Which rectangle is split into $7$ rows with $1$ column of same-size squares?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A rectangle divided into 7 equal squares in a column.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7dbd232c84de35f0314f9a95a56b26c917c28230)
![A rectangle divided into 7 smaller unequal rectangles. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1c88444ac222ca6c7d915d443c638bec810d9765)
